questions.question: CATALYST : REACTION :: SPARK : ____
questions.explanation: A catalyst initiates a reaction; a spark initiates ignition.

questions.question: APATHY : INTEREST :: STAGNATION : ____
questions.explanation: Apathy is the absence of interest; stagnation is the absence of progress.

questions.question: PARADOX : CONTRADICTION :: ENIGMA : ____
questions.explanation: A paradox is a type of contradiction; an enigma is a type of mystery.

questions.question: HIERARCHY : RANK :: TAXONOMY : ____
questions.explanation: Hierarchy organizes ranks; taxonomy organizes classifications.

questions.question: OSCILLATE : SWING :: VACILLATE : ____
questions.explanation: Oscillate is to swing physically; vacillate is to waver mentally.

questions.question: DICHOTOMY : DIVISION :: SYNERGY : ____
questions.explanation: Dichotomy involves division; synergy involves cooperation.

questions.question: EXONERATE : BLAME :: REHABILITATE : ____
questions.explanation: To exonerate is to remove blame; to rehabilitate is to restore.

questions.question: PRECURSOR : PRECEDE :: CONSEQUENCE : ____
questions.explanation: A precursor comes before; a consequence follows after.

questions.question: AXIOM : PROOF :: POSTULATE : ____
questions.explanation: An axiom requires no proof; a postulate is taken as an assumption.

questions.question: MITIGATE : REDUCE :: INTENSIFY : ____
questions.explanation: Mitigate means reduce severity; intensify means increase severity.

questions.question: PIVOT : CHANGE :: ENTRENCH : ____
questions.explanation: To pivot is to change direction; to entrench is to fortify a position.

questions.question: VERACITY : TRUTH :: DUPLICITY : ____
questions.explanation: Veracity means truthfulness; duplicity means deceitfulness.

questions.question: AMPLIFY : SOUND :: MAGNIFY : ____
questions.explanation: Amplify increases sound; magnify increases size of an image.

questions.question: ANOMALY : NORMAL :: OUTLIER : ____
questions.explanation: An anomaly deviates from normal; an outlier deviates from the pattern.

questions.question: PROTOTYPE : MODEL :: BLUEPRINT : ____
questions.explanation: A prototype is a model; a blueprint is a plan.

questions.question: ISOLATE : SEPARATE :: SYNTHESIZE : ____
questions.explanation: To isolate is to separate; to synthesize is to combine.

questions.question: PRUDENT : CAUTIOUS :: IMPETUOUS : ____
questions.explanation: Prudent means cautious; impetuous means reckless.

questions.question: COHESIVE : UNITED :: FRACTURED : ____
questions.explanation: Cohesive means united; fractured means broken.

questions.question: HYPERBOLE : EXAGGERATION :: EUPHEMISM : ____
questions.explanation: Hyperbole exaggerates; a euphemism softens meaning.

questions.question: CONFLUENCE : RIVERS :: MERGER : ____
questions.explanation: A confluence is rivers meeting; a merger is companies joining.

questions.question: ELICIT : RESPONSE :: TRIGGER : ____
questions.explanation: To elicit is to draw out a response; to trigger is to cause a reaction.

questions.question: DISTILL : PURIFY :: STREAMLINE : ____
questions.explanation: Distillation purifies; streamlining simplifies.

questions.question: METICULOUS : CAREFUL :: NEGLIGENT : ____
questions.explanation: Meticulous means extremely careful; negligent means extremely careless.

questions.question: DIVERGE : SEPARATE :: CONVERGE : ____
questions.explanation: To diverge is to separate; to converge is to unite.

questions.question: ABRIDGE : SHORTEN :: EXPAND : ____
questions.explanation: Abridge means shorten; expand means lengthen.
